article_title: Linda Chavez commentary: Wearing pajamas in public tells the world, ‘I’m lazy’
article_text:

article_metadata.description: I saw one at the airport on Monday and then another in the elevator on Wednesday. I see them on the street, at coffee shops around town, often at the grocery. Now Obamacare supporters have adopted one as the face of their new public-relations campaign.
